description: LT (Loctite Assets Token) is the equity token of Loctite Assets platform, which realizes the digitalization of assets. After the large-scale assets are divided, different quantities of LT represent different rights and interests. Ordinary investors can purchase any amount of property rights for investment, which greatly reduces the investment threshold of objects for investors.The listing of quantifiable asset on the blockchain provided by LT fundamentally solves the multi-level and multi-management problem of value circulation.
name: Loctite Assets Token
